title: Apron
description: rectangular cloth; red and black on one side; fuchsia and orange embroidery with chickens on one end; opposite side of cloth is green with black stripe down center; row of smaller embroidered chickens on one end; two long red ties with tassels on ends; one tie is plain except for embroidery at end; other tie is also has embroidery tassels near top of tie
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund and Gift of funds from Thirza Cleveland and Joan Wurtele
